xmlkeyword.term: Project Configuration, General Edit Command Dialog

paragraph.paragraph: The General Edit Command Dialog is used in a number of places throughout EiffelEnvision. It is a general purpose dialog for editing lists or for specifying multiple commands. In each application the dialog will be titled according it is purpose. For instance, when editing the build_events.xmlBuild Events it may be necessary to supply a number of commands to execute in the build_events.xmlpre_build_event_command_linePre-build Event Command Line than possible with a single line provided by the page's configuration grid.

The dialog provides a text field to enter the desired information in. For properties that consist of lists, such as the build.xmldebug_clausesDebug Clauses, each list item is separated by a new line. To add a new item simply add a new line with the appropiate item text. Clicking Okay will commit back any changes made to the property that activate the dialog. Cancel will discard any changes made in the dialog and the activating property will remain unchanged.
Pressing the Help button for pressing the F1 keyboard shortcut will display this help page.
